message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $120 by myself. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to me and the market value, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $110. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a great deal while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
